step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead with fingers open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Focus on a smooth transition to the next step.
Great effort making a fist and squeezing shoulder blades. Remember to inhale and tighten muscles during this phase.
Excellent job stretching arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep the movement controlled and relaxed.
You've completed the repetitions. Ensure you are repeating the full sequence 4 times as instructed.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your movements smooth and controlled, especially when stretching your arms overhead and making a fist. Remember to breathe with each part of the movement.
